attributes.action: Realise that the BBC spend more time advertising their own shows than commercial channels spend advertising products and abolish the TV License fee with no replacement tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/bbcmonopoly/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
